DROUGHT.name: Severe Drought
DROUGHT.description: A prolonged drought scorches the land, devastating crops and drying rivers.
DROUGHT.text: A terrible drought grips {region}. Crops wither and wells run dry.

PLAGUE.name: Plague Outbreak
PLAGUE.description: A devastating plague sweeps through settlements, killing thousands.
PLAGUE.text: Plague has broken out in {settlement}! The dead are piling up in the streets.

FLOOD.name: Great Flood
FLOOD.description: Rivers burst their banks, flooding farmland and washing away roads.
FLOOD.text: Devastating floods ravage the lowlands near {settlement}.

EARTHQUAKE.name: Earthquake
EARTHQUAKE.description: The earth shakes violently, toppling buildings and opening fissures.
EARTHQUAKE.text: A mighty earthquake strikes near {settlement}! Buildings crumble and the earth splits.

BOUNTIFUL_HARVEST.name: Bountiful Harvest
BOUNTIFUL_HARVEST.description: Ideal weather conditions produce a bumper harvest across the realm.
BOUNTIFUL_HARVEST.text: The harvest in {region} is the best in living memory! Granaries overflow.

GOLD_RUSH.name: Gold Rush
GOLD_RUSH.description: Rich gold deposits are discovered, drawing prospectors from across the realm.
GOLD_RUSH.text: Gold has been discovered near {settlement}! Prospectors flood into the region.

TRADE_BOOM.name: Trade Boom
TRADE_BOOM.description: A flourishing period of trade enriches merchants and kingdoms alike.
TRADE_BOOM.text: Trade flourishes across {region}. Merchants report record profits.

MARKET_CRASH.name: Market Crash
MARKET_CRASH.description: A sudden collapse in trade confidence sends markets into freefall.
MARKET_CRASH.text: Markets crash across {region}! Merchants are ruined and prices plummet.

PIRATE_SURGE.name: Pirate Surge
PIRATE_SURGE.description: Pirates grow bold and numerous, threatening coastal trade.
PIRATE_SURGE.text: Pirates terrorize the shipping lanes near {settlement}. Sea trade grinds to a halt.

BANDIT_UPRISING.name: Bandit Uprising
BANDIT_UPRISING.description: Organized bandit gangs terrorize the countryside.
BANDIT_UPRISING.text: Bandits have formed an organized gang near {settlement}. The roads are unsafe.

KINGDOM_WAR.name: Kingdom War
KINGDOM_WAR.description: Two kingdoms go to war, dragging their neighbors into the conflict.
KINGDOM_WAR.text: {kingdom1} declares war on {kingdom2}! Armies march to battle.

REBELLION.name: Peasant Rebellion
REBELLION.description: Oppressed peasants rise up against their lords.
REBELLION.text: The peasants of {settlement} have risen in rebellion against {kingdom}!

SUCCESSION_CRISIS.name: Succession Crisis
SUCCESSION_CRISIS.description: The death of a ruler without a clear heir throws a kingdom into turmoil.
SUCCESSION_CRISIS.text: The ruler of {kingdom} has died without a clear heir. Rival claimants vie for the throne.

DIPLOMATIC_MARRIAGE.name: Royal Wedding
DIPLOMATIC_MARRIAGE.description: A royal marriage unites two houses and eases tensions between kingdoms.
DIPLOMATIC_MARRIAGE.text: A grand wedding celebration! {kingdom1} and {kingdom2} forge an alliance through marriage.

RELIGIOUS_SCHISM.name: Religious Schism
RELIGIOUS_SCHISM.description: A major split within a faith divides believers and sows discord.
RELIGIOUS_SCHISM.text: A schism erupts within the {faith}! Believers are forced to choose sides.

HOLY_CRUSADE.name: Holy Crusade
HOLY_CRUSADE.description: Religious leaders call for a holy war to reclaim sacred territory.
HOLY_CRUSADE.text: A crusade is declared! The faithful rally to reclaim the holy lands.

COMET_SIGHTING.name: Comet Sighting
COMET_SIGHTING.description: A blazing comet streaks across the sky. Some see it as a blessing, others a curse.
COMET_SIGHTING.text: A comet appears in the night sky! Priests debate its meaning while the commoners tremble.

ECLIPSE.name: Solar Eclipse
ECLIPSE.description: The sun goes dark in the middle of the day, spreading fear and awe.
ECLIPSE.text: The sun is swallowed by darkness! An eclipse throws the realm into momentary panic.

MONSTER_SIGHTING.name: Monster Sighting
MONSTER_SIGHTING.description: A fearsome creature is sighted in the wilds, threatening travelers and settlements.
MONSTER_SIGHTING.text: A terrible beast has been sighted near {settlement}! Brave warriors are needed.

FESTIVAL.name: Grand Festival
FESTIVAL.description: A grand celebration brings joy and commerce to the realm.
FESTIVAL.text: {kingdom} celebrates a grand festival! Music, food, and merriment fill the streets.

REFUGEE_WAVE.name: Refugee Wave
REFUGEE_WAVE.description: War or disaster drives refugees to seek shelter in neighboring kingdoms.
REFUGEE_WAVE.text: Refugees pour into {settlement}, fleeing turmoil. They bring labor but strain resources.

VOLCANIC_ERUPTION.name: Volcanic Eruption
VOLCANIC_ERUPTION.description: A volcano erupts, raining ash and fire upon the surrounding lands.
VOLCANIC_ERUPTION.text: A volcano erupts with cataclysmic fury! Ash blots out the sun across {region}.

BLIZZARD.name: Great Blizzard
BLIZZARD.description: An unseasonably fierce blizzard blankets the land in deep snow.
BLIZZARD.text: A terrible blizzard sweeps across {region}. Roads are impassable and livestock freeze.
